Summary: Two glowing objects in the sky that seem to be traveling together over Brossard, QC
trends: There has been one other sighting in Brossard
There were no other sightings in Brossard on or around July 9th 2006
divs: sighting detailsjuly 9th 2006 8:30pm est on this slightly cloudy summer night, my wife, son and myself were visiting our newly bought land near quartier dix30 in brossard, qc. we spent a good 20 minutes walking around on our land and i took a number of pictures with my canon powershot a620 camera. at the time we were there, there were no sounds, no stars or planes in the sky. you could only see a blue sky with high altitude cloud levels. at 8:45pm est i took a picture of my wife and son overlooking the land where you can see the houses being built nearby. the view also provided a clear view of the sky. at the time i took the picture there was nothing in the sky. after our visit, we left the area and headed home. it is only a number of years later that i noticed, while re-examining the pictures, that the picture i took of my wife and son was also showing 2 glowing objects in the sky that seem to be traveling together (approx 1\2 mile apart). one of these glowing objects seemed to show a small but visible trail. the object with the trail seemed to show a disc-like shape. as i explained initially, when i took this picture there was nothing in the sky. these 2 objects only appeared on camera. when i took the picture the flash was on as well as the ir (infra-red) light to help minimize rabbit eyes. i'm not sure if this somehow contributed to the appearance of these objects but when i took the picture there was nothing in the sky that was visible to the naked eye. today i am quite certain that these are actual ufo objects which were not meant to be seen by the naked eye. the image submitted to mufon is the original high-res picture. it has not been modified or changed in any way. it also contains the complete exif metadata information.
